column4: my sound works! :D next thing i would like to fix is wifi: right now i have to open ndisgtk, remove driver, add driver. wifi then works (for the current boot) but in stdout/stderr it prints: module configuration already contains alias directive
anyone knows how i can fix that situation ? my last question regards beagled/trackerd which somehow i installed them maybe or they got installed when i upgraded to 7.10
(but i don't know which packages they belong to)
